Name: Infant-like
Quote: Your abilities are too infant-like for doing much alone

Name: Butter
Quote: Thou art as fat as butter

Name: Rascally!
Quote: You poor, base, rascally, cheating lack-linen mate!

Name: You scullion!
Quote: You scullion! You rampallian! You fustilarian! I’ll tickle your catastrophe!

Name: Bawdy villain!
Quote: Bloody, bawdy villain! Remorseless, treacherous, lecherous, kindless villain!

Name: Thou flea
Quote: Thou flea, thou nit, thou winter-cricket thou!
Source: (The Taming of the Shrew, Act 3, Scene 3)

Name: told by an idiot
Quote: It is a tale told by an idiot, full of sound and fury, signifying nothing
